remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的集合 ( ) 可通过控件的属性进行访问。The collection of objects (the ) is accessed through the control's property. 当您将属性设置为相应的数据源时, 控件将自动为您创建对象集合。The control automatically creates a collection of objects for you when you set the property to an appropriate data source. 所创建的对象实际上是继承自: 或类的以下类之一的实例。The objects created actually are instances of one of the following classes that inherit from : or class. 若要设置数据显示的格式, 请将类的属性设置为格式设置值之一。To format the data display, set the property of the class to one of the formatting values. 有关有效格式设置值的详细信息, 请参阅[格式设置类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information about valid formatting values, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 还可以创建自己的一组对象并将其添加到中。You can also create your own set of objects and add them to the . 如果执行此操作, 则必须将每个列样式的设置为的, 以使列的显示与实际数据同步。When you do so, you must set the of each column style to the of a to synchronize the display of columns with the actual data. > [!CAUTION] > 始终创建对象并将其添加到中, 然后将对象添加到中。Always create objects and add them to the before adding objects to the . 向集合添加具有有效值 的空值时, 将自动为您生成对象。When you add an empty with a valid value to the collection, objects are automatically generated for you. 因此, 如果尝试将具有重复 值的新对象添加到中, 将引发异常。Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new objects with duplicate values to the . 当某个派生类由控件实例化时, 创建的类将取决 于与该对象关联的的。When one of the derived classes is instantiated by a control, the class created depends on the of the associated with the object. 例如, 其设置为`System.Boolean`的将与相关联。For example, a with its set to `System.Boolean` will be associated with a . 若要确定任何类型, 请使用方法。To determine the type of any , use the method. 若要创建您自己的列类, 您可以从继承。To create your own column classes, you can inherit from . 您可能想要执行此操作, 以便创建承载控件的特殊列, 如 承载控件的类的举例说明。You might want to do this in order to create special columns that host controls, as exemplified by the class, which hosts the control. 例如, 您可以承载一个控件以显示列中的图片, 也可以创建自己的用户控件以承载于列中。For example, you can host an control to show pictures in columns, or you can create your own user control to host in the column. 的功能不应与的功能混淆。The functionality of the shouldn't be confused with that of the . 尽管包含适用于创建数据表架构的属性和方法 , 但包含与屏幕上单个列的外观相关的属性和方法。 Whereas the contains the properties and methods appropriate to creating a data table's schema, the contains the properties and methods related to the appearance of an individual column on the screen. 如果行包含, 则可以使用属性设置列中显示的文本。If a row contains a , the text displayed in the column can be set with the property. 类还允许您指定列的行为, 同时更改其数据。The class also allows you to specify the behavior of a column while its data is being changed. 当对列的数据进行大的更新时,和方法会临时挂起列的绘制。The and methods temporarily suspend the drawing of the column while large updates are being made to the column's data. 如果没有此功能, 则会立即绘制网格每个单元格中的每个更改;这可能会给用户造成混乱, 并会产生性能责任。Without this functionality, every change in every cell of the grid would be immediately drawn; this could be distracting to the user and a performance liability. 使用几种方法, 可以在用户编辑列时对列进行监视, 包括和事件。Several methods allow monitoring of the column as it is edited by the user, including the and events. 类的大多数属性和方法都是为控制列的外观定制的。Most of the properties and methods of the class are tailored to controlling a column's appearance. 但有些, 如和, 它允许您检查和更改指定单元中的值。But a few, such as the and allow you to examine and change the value in a specified cell. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 承载控件的。The following code example creates a that hosts a control. span.span: Suspends the painting of the column until the method is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对控件的外观进行了许多更改 (无论这些更改是在列的属性中, 还是控件显示的数据), 则应调用方法来暂时冻结控件的绘制。When many changes are made to the appearance of a control (whether the changes are in the attributes of the column or the data displayed by the control), you should invoke the method to temporarily freeze the drawing of the control. 这会减少用户产生的干扰, 并提高性能。This results in less distraction to the user, and a performance gain. 完成所有更新后, 调用方法以恢复控件的绘制。After all updates have been made, invoke the method to resume drawing of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对控件的外观进行了许多更改 (无论这些更改是在列的属性中, 还是控件显示的数据), 则应调用方法来暂时冻结控件的绘制。When many changes are made to the appearance of a control (whether the changes are in the attributes of the column or the data displayed by the control), you should invoke the method to temporarily freeze the drawing of the control. 这会减少用户产生的干扰, 并提高性能。This results in less distraction to the user, and a performance gain. 完成所有更新后, 调用方法以恢复控件的绘制。After all updates have been made, invoke the method to resume drawing of the control.
